name: David Campbell
appearance: A tall, handsome man whose appearance is strikingly youthful for his age, with a polished and aristocratic demeanor.
personality: Pragmatic, opportunistic, and ruthless when necessary; values results and survival over morality.
background: David Campbell arrived in Cassandra alongside Isaiah Arbar six years ago as a wealthy investor. His wife, like Isaiah’s, was a member of the Black Goat Cult. Though initially terrified upon discovering the truth, David’s stance changed after participating in the cult’s rituals and gaining supernatural benefits. He and Isaiah exploited the cult’s power for profit, selling access to the Dark Mother’s ‘milk’. In 2002, David was also transformed during a ritual and disappeared, officially recorded as missing.
goals: Maintain power and survival through occult transformation
secrets: He knowingly assisted in human sacrifices
He was transformed into a monster during a failed or completed ritual

clues.clueText: David Campbell and Isaiah Arbar traveled across Europe and America to avoid authorities while continuing cult sacrifices.
Young women were considered the best sacrifices for their rituals.

relationships.description: Long-term business partner and fellow cultist.
relationships.history: United by marriage ties to the cult and mutual greed, they jointly pursued forbidden power.

notes: Like Isaiah, David is officially missing and presumed dead, but his true fate is far worse.

properties.note: 资料以“Isaiah Arbar & David Campbell（富商）”整体背景为主（黑山羊密教/莎布相关）；未给出大卫的具体随身物品清单。
